SEARCH
Package com.emse.spring.automacorp

Class RoomController

java.lang.Object
com.emse.spring.automacorp.RoomController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/rooms") public class RoomController extends Object
REST controller for managing Room entities. Provides endpoints to fetch all rooms, fetch a room by ID, and create a new room.

  • Method Details

    • getAllRooms

      @GetMapping public List<RoomEntity> getAllRooms()
      Fetches all rooms from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all RoomEntity objects.

    • getRoomById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Optional<RoomEntity> getRoomById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Fetches a room by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the room to fetch.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the RoomEntity, or empty if not found.

    • createRoom

      @PostMapping public RoomEntity createRoom(@RequestBody RoomEntity room)
      Creates a new room and saves it to the database.
      Parameters:
      room - the RoomEntity object to be created.
      Returns:
      the created RoomEntity.
